headline.main: ROOSEVELT COUNCIL MAPS FURTHER AID; Cabinet Leaders and Heads of Armed Forces Confer With President for 3 Hours STRICT SECRECY OBSERVED Question of Convoys or Ship Transfers Believed Among the Problems Discussed

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 2 -- New plans for further aid to Britain and her allies and for speeding up of national defense were the main themes for a three and a quarter-hour conference at the White House of President Roosevelt and his inner defense council.
abstract: Conf with Roosevelt on lend-lease fund use for ships and ship repairs
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 2 -- New plans for further aid to Britain and her allies and for speeding up of national defense were the main themes for a three and a quarter-hour conference at the White House of President Roosevelt and his inner defense counc...
